title: TVS Motor rolls out electric scooter iQube equipped with host of features
description: The Chennai-based company said it has unveiled three variants of the electric scooter which would have a seven inch touchscreen, voice assist, iQube Alexa skillset, music player, fast charging with plug and play, bluetooth connectivity among others.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
